His dream is to someday be able to rend a store and stock it with a variety of products.

loans.use: to buy telephone cards wholesale.

loans.name: Mireya

texts.es: La Sra. Mireya sigue la misma actividad de la Venta de comida, cuenta que le fue bien con el anterior crédito ya que lo utilizo en la compra de insumos para la elaboración de sus comidas,   en esta ocasión solicita el crédito para la compra de mesas y sillas para su negocio ya que creció en su actividad y en clientela y desea brindar mayor comodidad a su clientela  se siente feliz y agradecida por la oportunidad que le dan para crecer en su negocio.
texts.en: Mireya continues working selling food. Things went well with the previous loan as she used it to buy supplies for making her meals. At this time she is asking for a loan to buy tables and chairs for her business as her business has grown and she wants to to make her customers more comfortable. She is happy and grateful for the opportunity given to help her grow her business.

loans.use: to buy tables and chairs to be used in her food business

loans.name: Flora

texts.en:
Flora is a 27 year old married woman with six children. 

She has a small plantation and grows different vegetables to earn a living. She has been doing this for two years.

Flora has requested a loan to buy vegetable seeds, a pick, fertilizer, gloves, a spade, a garden hose, and barbed wire.

She has been a member of SPBD since 2013. With her profits, Flora hopes to improve her business to earn good money.

loans.use: to buy vegetable seeds, a pick, fertilizer, gloves, a spade, a garden hose, and barbed wire

loans.name: Keke

texts.en:
Keke is 28 years old and married with two children. She runs a small business selling ice-cakes in her community, and has been doing this for one year. 

Keke has requested a loan to buy foam cups, sugar, spoons, a cooler, cordial and chinese lollies (salty preserved plums). 

She joined SPBD in 2013 to gain access to capital. Keke will use her earnings to improve her business to increase her income.

loans.use: to buy foam cups, sugar, spoons, a cooler, cordial and chinese lollies (salty preserved plums)

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy cement, iron, blocks, and sand

loans.name: Yulieth Patricia

texts.es: Gracias por apoyar a Yulieth quien con su anterior credikiva compró una vitrina y la surtió de productos faciales y de perfumería. Esta inversión le ha generado buenas utilidades y por eso pudo hacer adecuaciones a su vivienda y la mejoró. Hoy está aplicando a un nuevo credikiva, con el cual comprará artículos de lencería, como sabanas y toallas, porque son productos, que por ser de primera necesidad en los hogares tiene una mayor rotación y esto potencializa la venta en un menor tiempo de exhibición. Yulieth dice a sus financiadores: “ Gracias por su amplio apoyo y confianza. “
texts.en: Thank you for supporting Yulieth. With her previous Kiva loan, Yulieth bought a shop window and stocked it with facial products and perfume. This investment has generated good profits for her. Thanks to this, she was able to make adjustments to her home and improve it. Today she is applying for a new Kiva loan. She will use the loan to buy linen articles, such as sheets and towels because they are essential home products that have a higher turnover. This generates sales with a shorter display time. Yulieth says to her financial backers: “Thank you for your generous support and confidence.“

loans.use: to buy linen products to sell.

loans.name: Isabella

texts.en:
Isabella is a 26-year-old woman who is single with no children. She has a small business of elei printing (printing on Polynesian fabrics). She has been doing this for one year. 

Isabella needs a loan to buy carved wooden designs, paints, materials, stencils, and brushes. 

She will use her profits to improve her business. 

Isabella joined SPBD in 2013 to gain access to financial services.

loans.use: to buy carved wooden designs, paints, materials, stencils, and brushes

loans.name: Mohammad

texts.en:
Mohammad is 21 years old, from Ramallah. He is a street vendor selling clothes; he helps his parents with their finances.

Mohammad asked Ryada for this loan to buy more clothes to sell. 

He hopes that this loan will help him to complete his education at the university.

His dream is to purchase a proper store.

loans.use: to buy more clothes to sell.

loans.name: Ahmad

texts.en:
Ahmad is 23 years old, and he has been working in the barbershop for a year. He needs this youth loan to decorate the barbershop, and to purchase razors and new equipment. 

He hopes that this loan will improve his business and increase his income, so he can save money to get married and have his own family. 

His future ambition is to develop his barbershop and increase his income.

loans.use: to decorate the barbershop and purchase razors and new equipment.

loans.name: Victor

texts.es: Víctor es un hombre casado de 49 años que vive junto a su esposa Felicitas y sus 3 hijos en su casa propia hecha de madera. Se dedica a la agricultura desde muy niño y gracias a sus padres aprendió a usar está actividad como un buen sustento para mantener económicamente a su familia. Posee un terreno de 2 hectáreas con plantaciones de cacao y árboles frutales  que trata de mantener siempre en constante producción y buen estado. Trata de brindarle una buena atención a sus plantaciones de cacao por ser uno de los productos más comerciales de su zona y porque sus terrenos de cultivo son muy fértiles para este producto. Trabaja diariamente incluso los domingos y feriados junto a su esposa y con la ayuda de trabajadores del lugar realiza algunas labores como el retiro de maleza y corte de tallos defectuosos. Siente que el trabajo es algo agotador pero desea sacar a su familia adelante. Desea con el tiempo poner una tienda de productos comestibles en su casa para que su esposa tenga un trabajo menos forzoso y esté siempre al cuidado de sus pequeños. Este es su primer crédito con Kiva y se siente agradecido por el apoyo financiero que recibe para seguir adelante, además se compromete a pagar sus cuotas de manera puntual. En esta oportunidad desea contar con 2,000 nuevos soles para la compra de abono orgánico y semillas de cacao para incrementar su producción.
texts.en:
Víctor is a married man, 49 years old, who lives with his wife Felicitas and 3 children in his own house made of wood. He has worked in agriculture since he was very young and he learned from his parents to do this activity which has been good support in maintaining his family financially. 

He has 2 hectares of land planted with cocoa and fruit trees that he tries to keep in constant production and in a good state. He tries to provide good care to his cocoa plantations since it is one of the most marketable products of his area and because his land is very fertile for this crop.

He works daily including Sundays and holidays with his wife and with the help of laborers who help with weeding and cutting any stalks that are defective. He feels that the work is exhausting but wants to provide for his family. He hopes over time to have a grocery store in his home so that his wife can have work which is less driven and where she can always care for the little ones.

This is his first Kiva loan and he feels grateful for the financial support that he receives to help him get ahead. He promises to make his payments in a punctual manner. At this time he is asking for 2,000 soles in order to buy organic fertilizer and cocoa seeds to increase his production.

loans.use: to buy organic fertilizer and cocoa seeds

loans.name: Madre Teresa De Calcuta Group

texts.es: La nueva  Alcancía Comunal  “Madre Teresa De Calcuta” conformada por 06 socios entusiastas de comenzar a trabajar. Liliana de 40 años es casada 05 de ellos en etapa escolar. Actualmente cuenta con un negocio de  venta de pizza, lleva en esta actividad hace más de 06 meses. Este negocio surgió gracias al apoyo de su esposo, pues fue él quien la motivo a emprender. Se siente feliz pues ha podido a poyar a su familia. Su mayor deseo es de seguir implementando su negocio. El crédito que solicitó lo destinará para la compra de insumos como queso, masa de pizza, aceite y utensilios como cubiertos. El nuevo grupo “Madre Teresa De Calcuta” agradece el crédito brindado. Liliana es la primera del lado derecho y viste casaca negra.
texts.en:
The new communal bank “Madre Teresa De Calcuta” is made up of 6 members who are enthusiastic about starting to work together.  Liliana, 40, is married and has 5 school-aged children.  She currently has a business selling pizza, which she's had for more than 6 months.  She started up the business thanks to the support of her husband; he was the one who motivated her to launch the business.  Liliana feels happy because she's been able to support her family.  Her main wish is to continue to equip her business.  She's asking for a loan to buy supplies such as cheese, pizza dough and cooking oil, and to buy utensils such as covers.  

The new communal bank “Madre Teresa De Calcuta” is grateful for the loan that is being provided.  Liliana is seen on the far right side of the photo, wearing a black jacket.

loans.use: to buy cheese, pizza dough, cooking oil, and utensils

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy new merchandize sent from the capital, such as metal jewellery and cosmetics.

loans.name: Kholida

texts.ru: Холида замужем, детей еще не имеет. Ей 25 лет. Она живет с мужем в районе Дж.Руми. Ее муж выполняет разные работы, чтобы зарабатывать. Он занимается плотничеством, изготавливает глиняные кирпичи для продажи, а также помогает жене в ее деятельности. Холида занимается растениеводством. Она арендует небольшой участок орошаемой земли, где выращивает огородные культуры. Холида занимается этой деятельностью последние два года. Сейчас она просит кредит для приобретения семян картофеля и минеральных удобрений. Холида планирует расширения деятельности в будущем. Она трудолюбивая женщина и не боится тяжелой сельской работы, напротив она получает массу удовольствий когда работает землей.
texts.en:
Kholida is married but does not have any children yet.  She is 25 years old and lives with her husband in the J. Rumi district of Tajikistan.  Her husband works odd jobs in order to make a living.  He is involved in carpentry, he manufactures clay bricks for resale and he also helps his wife with her own crop farming activity.  

For the past two years, Kholida has been renting a small plot of irrigated land on which she grows vegetable crops.  She is now asking for a loan to buy potato seeds and mineral fertilizers.  In the future, she plans to expand her activity.  

Kholida is a hardworking woman who is not afraid of hard farm work.  To the contrary, she derives a lot of satisfaction when working on the land.

loans.use: to buy potato seeds and mineral fertilizers.

loans.name: Angelo Hernan

texts.es: El Sr. Ángelo  tiene 19 años, el se dedica  a la fabricación de  sombreros para varones como para mujeres, realiza esta actividad desde hace ya varios años actividad que aprendió de su padre,  el tiene su tienda en zona de Pampahasi,  este préstamo es su primera secuencia dentro de la institución, El Sr. Ángelo    va a usar este préstamo para la compra de material para la fabricación de sombreros ,  enfrenta retos en su negocio que son salir de la pobreza y va a utilizar los beneficios para mejorar su calidad de vida, su deseo es vender sus productos artesanales a distintas localidades de la ciudad de La Paz  y ser una de los mejores artesanas, se siente feliz  y agradecido con la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en:
Angelo is 19 years old and has a business making hats for men and women.  He learned this trade from his father, and he's been doing this work for a number of years already.  He has a store in the Pampahasi neighborhood.  This will be his second loan with the institution.  

Angelo will use this loan to buy raw materials to make hats.  His challenge is to use the business to overcome poverty.  He will use the profits from the business to improve his quality of life.  His wants to sell his hand-crafted products in various places around the city of La Paz and become one of the best artisans.  He is happy and grateful to the institution for this support.

loans.use: to buy supplies to make hats

loans.name: Jorge Alfredo

texts.es:
Jorge es un hombre de 30 años,vive en la ciudad de Pisco con su esposa y sus dos pequeños hijos, el es una persona muy amable, trabajadora y entusiasta, que junto con su esposa dedican todos esfuerzos por sacar adelante a su familia; lamentablemente por falta de recursos económicos y por la necesidad de trabajar, Jorge no pudo estudiar la carrera profesional de Ingeniería Mecánica que deseaba.
Por iniciativa propia, Jorge trabaja como chofer de mototaxi, brindando servicios de transporte en su ciudad, el trabaja todos los días por un aproximado de 10 horas y cree que le va bien por su dedicación y esfuerzo.
Jorge se encuentra muy agradecido con los prestamistas Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada cubrirá los gastos de mantenimiento de su mototaxi, adicionalmente mejorará las puertas de su hogar, así pues Jorge seguirá trabajando y esforzándose para lograr su gran sueño de terminar la construcción de su vivienda.
texts.en:
Jorge is 30 years old and lives in the city of Pisco with his wife and their two young children. He is a very kind, hard-working and enthusiastic person, who, with his wife, puts his all into moving forwards with his family.  Unfortunately, because of a lack of money and the need to work, Jorge was unable to study a degree in Mechanical Engineering like he wanted. 

On his own initiative, Jorge works as a rickshaw driver, providing transport services in his city. He works for around 10 hours every day and thinks that things are going well because of his dedication and effort.

Jorge is very grateful to Kiva lenders, because thanks to their help he will be able to cover the costs of servicing his rickshaw. In addition, he will make improvements to the doors of his home. In this way, Jorge will keep working hard to achieve his dream of finishing building his home.

loans.use: to service his rickshaw.

loans.name: Dally

texts.en:
Dally is 52 years old and married with seven children.

Dally works hard to provide for her family. She buys and sells dried coconut meat in the Philippines and has requested a PHP 12000 loan through NWTF to buy more stocks of dried coconut meat to sell.

Dally has borrowed and paid 25 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the business for 2 years and also earns an income from farming coconuts and bananas and raising water buffalo.

She successfully paid back her previous loans and is now requesting a new loan to further build her business.

Dally aspires to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy more stocks of dried coconut meat to sell.

loans.name: Marivic

texts.en:
Marivic works hard to support her family. She is married, and she has a business, buying and selling fruits and vegetables in the Philippines. She has been in this business for 15 years.

Marivic requested a PHP 15,000 loan through NWTF. She will use the loan to buy more fruits and vegetables to sell. She would like to build and expand her business, to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy more fruits and vegetables to sell in her food stall

loans.name: Editha

texts.en:
Editha is 52 years old and married; she has seven children. She earns a living by cultivating and selling bananas in the Philippines. She has been doing that work for 10 years, and she earns additional income by farming rice.

Editha is borrowing PHP 11,000 through NWTF. She will use the loan to purchase fertilizer for her banana plants. She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream: to build and expand her business, to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer for her banana plants

loans.name: Ponciana

texts.en:
Ponciana works hard to support her family. Ponciana is married and has a business buying and selling lumber in the Philippines.

Ponciana requested a PHP 28,000 loan through NWTF to buy more lumber to sell.

Ponciana has been in this business for 20 years now and earns additional income from charcoal vending.

In the future, Ponciana would like to save enough money to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy more lumber to sell

loans.name: Yaneth

texts.es:
Yaneth tiene  24 años, está casada con Alfredo y tiene 3 hijos con quienes vive en su casa propia. Yaneth trabaja en el campo cultivando cacao y café para mantener a su familia. Realiza sus labores con el apoyo de su esposo en un terreno de cultivo de 2 hectáreas. Trata de mantener siempre sus plantaciones en buen estado porque le permite obtener una buena calidad de los frutos en la cosecha y vender sus productos a buen precio. 
Cuando llega la cosecha contrata más personal de apoyo para la recolección de los frutos maduros para luego secarlos al aire libre y posteriormente venderlos a los comerciantes de la ciudad. En el futuro espera comprar otro terreno para empezar a cultivar palillo y así obtener mayores ingresos económicos. Este es su primer crédito con Kiva y se siente agradecida por el apoyo financiero que recibe para seguir adelante, además se compromete a pagar sus cuotas de manera puntual. En esta ocasión desea contar con 2,000 nuevos soles para la compra de abono orgánico.
texts.en:
Yaneth, 24, is married to Alfredo, and they have 3 children.  They live in their own home.  Yaneth works in the fields cultivating cocoa and coffee to support her family.  She does this work with the support of her husband on 2 hectares of land.  She tries to always keep her crops in good condition, because this will allow her to obtain good quality beans in the harvest which she can sell at a good price.

When the harvest time arrives, she hires more people to support her in collecting the mature beans.  Later she dries them outdoors, and later sells them to the traders in the city.  In the future, she hopes to buy another plot of land where she could start cultivating turmeric in order to obtain more income.  This is her first loan with Kiva, and she feels grateful for the financial support that she is receiving so that she can continue to make progress.  She promises to make her payments on time.  

At this time, she wants to borrow 2,000 Peruvian soles to purchase organic fertilizer.

loans.use: to buy organic fertilizer

loans.name: Fatima

texts.en:
Fatima is a 48-year-old married mother of five children, four of them at the primary school. She currently has a business weaving and selling embroidered blankets and she has one employee. She started this trade 10 years ago, learning her technique in a workshop where she was employed, and later decided to start her own shop.

The loan she is currently taking out is to increase her capital to buy silk, canvas, and a sewing machine. She will get these items from a distributor's wholesale. She will then embroider and sell her products at her shop. This allows her to generate income to support her family.

loans.use: to buy silk, canvas, and a sewing machine.

loans.name: Hailyn

texts.en:
As a married parent of four children, three of them in school, Hailyn works hard to support her family. She has a fishing business in the Philippines, and she earns additional income by farming rice.

Hailyn is borrowing PHP 10,000 through NWTF. She will use the loan to buy additional fishing net, for her fishing business.

She successfully paid back her previous loan, and now she requests a new loan, to further build her fishing and rice-farming businesses. Hailyn has been sustaining her business activities through her past 13 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream:  to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy additional additional fishing net, for her fishing business

loans.name: Julie Ann

texts.en:
As a 35-year-old single woman, Julie Ann works hard to earn a living to support her parents 

She has a restaurant business in the Philippines and earns additional income from her general store. Julie Ann is borrowing PHP 18,000 through NWTF to buy additional ingredients for her restaurant business.

She successfully paid back her previous loan and is now requesting a new loan to further build her business.

Julie Ann has been sustaining her business activities through her past 28 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream of saving money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy additional ingredients

loans.name: Rufina

texts.en:
Rufina is 63 years old and has six children. Rufina is married and one of her children is in school.

Rufina is in the agricultural business doing pig fattening in the Philippines. Rufina requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

Rufina has been in this business for 15 years now and has borrowed seven times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

Rufina would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs

loans.name: Lodrina

texts.en:
Lodrina is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a general store business in the Philippines. 

She is borrowing PHP 10,000 through NWTF to buy additional items like sugar, bread, rice, eggs, shampoo, groceries, etc. to sell for her general store business. Lodrina has been in this business for 13 years. Lodrina earns additional income from buying and selling dried fish and raising pigs.

She successfully paid back her previous loan and is now requesting a new loan to further build her business. Lodrina has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. 

She dreams to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: To buy additional items like sugar, bread, rice, eggs, shampoo, groceries, etc. to sell

loans.name: Susana

texts.en:
Susana is a married woman with five children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. Susana is 49 years old and has one child who is in school.

Susana has a business raising pigs in the Philippines. Susana requested a PHP 14,000 loan amount through NWTF to purchase feed, vitamins, and other supplies for her pigs.

Susana has been in this business for 10 years. Susana would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase feed, vitamins, and other supplies for her pigs

loans.name: Teresita

texts.en:
Teresita is a hardworking entrepreneur, who has a food vending business in the Philippines. She has been in this business for five years, and she earns additional income by raising pigs.

She is borrowing PHP 16,000 through NWTF. She will use the loan to buy ingredients for her food production business. Teresita has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts, with the help of loans from NWTF. She dreams of building and expanding her business, to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her food production business

loans.name: Vilma

texts.en:
Vilma is 39 years old and married with six children. With four children currently in school, Vilma works very hard to provide for them.

Vilma runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional stocks to sell like canned goods, bread, cooking oil, noodles, coffee, etc. in her general store.

Vilma has been in this business for four years and sells a variety of items such as canned goods, bread, cooking oil, noodles, coffee, etc. 

In the future, Vilma would like to save enough money to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase additional stocks to sell like canned goods, bread, cooking oil, noodles, coffee, etc.

loans.name: Maria Fe

texts.en:
Maria Fe is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a business buying and selling charcoal in the Philippines. 

She is borrowing PHP 11,000 through NWTF to buy additional sacks of charcoal to sell for her charcoal business. Maria Fe has been in this business for 10 years. Maria Fe earns additional income from motorcycle transportation.

Maria Fe has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy additional sacks of charcoal to sell

loans.name: Marites

texts.en:
As a married parent of two children, Marites works hard to support her family. She has a business, buying and selling dried coconut meat, in the Philippines. She earns additional income by selling prepared foods.

Marites is borrowing PHP 15,000 through NWTF, which she will use to purchase additional sacks of dried coconut meat to sell. Marites has been sustaining her business activities through her past 16 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream:  to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase additional sacks of dried coconut meat to sell

loans.name: Vilma

texts.en:
Vilma is 42 years old, married and has three children. She is in the agricultural business, raising pigs in the Philippines. She has been doing this work for one year.

Vilma requested a PHP 11,000 loan through NWTF to buy feeds and vaccines for her pigs. She has borrowed five times in the past from NWTF, to sustain her business activities. Vilma would like to build and expand her business, to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy feed and vaccines for her pigs

loans.name: Rowena

texts.en:
Rowena works hard to support her family. Rowena is married and has a furniture shop business in the Philippines.

Rowena requested a PHP 29,500 loan through NWTF to buy additional materials like wood, nails, etc.

Rowena has been in this business for 10 years now.

In the future, Rowena would like to save enough money to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy additional materials like wood, nails, etc

loans.name: Rowena

texts.en:
As a married parent of three children, Rowena works hard to support her family.
,
She has a fishing business in the Philippines, and earns additional income from food vending. Rowena is borrowing PHP 24,500 through NWTF to buy materials for the maintenance of her fishing boat for her fishing business.

Rowena has been sustaining her business activities through her past seven loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream of building and expanding her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy materials to maintain her fishing boat

loans.name: Vetaliana

texts.en:
Vetaliana is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a fishing business in the Philippines. She is borrowing PHP 27,000 through NWTF to buy an additional fishing net for her fishing business.

Vetaliana has been in this business for 20 years. Vetaliana earns more income from buying and selling fish. Vetaliana has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. 

She dreams to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy an additional fishing net for her business

loans.name: Josielinda

texts.en:
Josielinda works hard to support her family. Josielinda is married and has a general store business in the Philippines.

Josielinda requested a PHP 12,000 loan through NWTF to buy additional items like shampoo, cream, sugar, laundry soap, bread, etc. to sell in her general store.

Josielinda has been in this business for three years now.

In the future, Josielinda would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy additional items like shampoo, cream, sugar, laundry soap, bread, etc. to sell in her general store

loans.name: Vina

texts.en:
Vina is 32 years old and married.  She has five children, four of whom are in school. Vina is in the agricultural business, fattening pigs, in the Philippines. She has been doing this work for six years.

Vina requested a PHP 16,000 loan through NWTF. She will use the loan to buy additional feed and vitamins for her pigs. Vina has borrowed 11 times in the past from NWTF, to sustain her pig-fattening business.

In the future, Vina would like to build and expand her business, to secure the financial stability of her family.

loans.use: to buy additional feed and vitamins for her pigs

loans.name: Liezel

texts.en:
As a married parent of three children, Liezel works hard to support her family. She has a fishing business in the Philippines, and she earns additional income by keeping a general store.

Liezel is borrowing PHP 15,000 through NWTF. She will use the loan to buy additional equipment and tools for her fishing business.

Liezel has been sustaining her business activities through her past seven loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream:  to build and expand her business, to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy additional equipment and tools for her fishing business

loans.name: Lucena

texts.en:
Lucena is 43 years old and married; she has two children. She works very hard to provide for them, running a general store in the Philippines. She has been in this business for five years and sells a variety of items, such as bread, noodles, eggs, bath soap, soft drinks, and cooking oil. 

She has requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF. She will use the loan to purchase more goods to sell in her general store. Lucena would like to build and expand her business, to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase more goods to sell in her general store

loans.name: Natividad

texts.en:
Natividad is 53 years old and married with one child.

She earns a living by farming vegetables in the Philippines. Natividad is borrowing PHP 13,000 through NWTF to purchase fertilizers and other farm supplies.

Natividad has been farming vegetables for four years and earns additional income from buying and selling bananas.

She is working tirelessly towards the attainment of her dream of saving enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers and other farm supplies

loans.name: Dioscora

texts.en:
Dioscora works hard to support her family. Dioscora is single and has a business raising livestock in the Philippines.

Dioscora requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to buy vaccines and vitamins for her livestock.

Dioscora has been in this business for 14 years now.

In the future, Dioscora would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy vaccines and vitamins for her livestock

loans.name: Nicolasa

texts.en:
Nicolasa is 48 years old, married and has four children. 

Nicolasa is in the agricultural business raising pigs in the Philippines. Nicolasa requested a PHP 16,000 loan through NWTF to purchase feed and vitamins for her pigs.

Nicolasa has been raising pigs for one year now and has borrowed five times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

Nicolasa would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase feed and vitamins for her pigs

loans.name: Lorna

texts.en:
Lorna works hard to support her family. She is married, and she has a general store business in the Philippines. Lorna has been in this business for 10 years.

She has requested a PHP 15,000 loan through NWTF. She will use the loan to buy more goods to sell in her general store. Lorna would like to build and expand her business, to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy more stocks to sell in her general store

loans.name: Leonora

texts.en:
Leonora works hard to support her family. She has a live-in partner. She owns a business, selling meat from roasted whole pigs, in the Philippines. She has been in this business for a period of 10 years.

Leonora requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF, which she will use to buy pigs and spices for her roasted-pork business. She would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy pigs and spices for her roasted-pork business

loans.name: Fadi

texts.en:
Fadi is 28 years old, and a single man from Qalqilia city. He lives with his family, in an old house in the city. Fadi has been working in a barber shop he owns for five years. it is located in a very good area in the city, and he has his own loyal customers.

Fadi would like to improve his barber shop, to increase his income and improve his family's living conditions. He took a USD loan from FATEN. This loan will help him to buy new shaving machines and beauty products, which he will use in his daily work. This will improve his business and will attract more customers. Fadi appears in the photo, in his salon.

loans.use: to buy new shaving machines and beauty products, which he will use in his daily work

loans.name: Areej

texts.en:
Areej is a conservative person who prefers not to have her photo published online, so her husband appears in the photo while he was taking care of the sheep.

Areej is a 31-year-old married woman from a small village near Ramallah city. She is a mother for six young children: two boys and four daughters. All of them are under 10 years old. Areej's husband is a worker outside Ramallah. His income is not stable, so he opened his own business three years ago, which is raising sheep. It is a profitable business but needs a lot of time and effort. Areej helps her husband sometimes in taking care of the sheep. 

Areej took a loan from FATEN. This loan will help her to buy more sheep for the family farm. This will improve their business and increase their income.

loans.use: to buy more sheep for the family farm.

loans.name: Nasrullo

texts.ru: Насрулло житель города Вахдат. Он 42-летний женатый мужчина, имеет троих детей. Насрулло обеспечивает свою семью за счет предоставляемой услуги такси. Он работает по линии город Душанбе - Ходжа Обигарм и за день делает один круг. Он занимается этой деятельностью в течение 4-х лет. Насрулло сейчас нуждается в кредите. Ему необходимо отремонтировать свой микроавтобус для улучшения процесса работы, а также провести ремонтные работы в доме, чтобы улучшить условия проживания. С этими намерениями он обратился за кредитом. В будущем Насрулло планирует купить новый транспорт, а также приобрести скот для хозяйства.
texts.en:
Nasrullo lives in Vahdat, Tajikistan.  He is 42 years old, married, and the father of three children.  He supports his family by providing taxi services on the Dushanbe - Khodja Obigarm route, completing one return trip per day.  He has been involved in this activity for the past four years.  

Nasrullo currently needs a loan to repair his van and his house, in order to improve both his working and living conditions.  With these goals in mind he has decided to apply for a  loan.  In the future, he would like to buy a new vehicle as well as some livestock to raise at home.

loans.use: to repair his van and his house.

loans.name: Mohammad

texts.en:
Mohammad is 27 years old and a married man, from a small village near Qalqilia city. He lives with his wife in an old and smiple house. Mohammad is a construction worker. His income is not stable, because it is a seasonal job.

Mohammad took a USD loan from FATEN. This loan will help him to repair his house, especially the electrical wiring and the paint. This will improve the family's living conditions and provide a safe and comfortable home. Mohammad appears in the photo.

loans.use: to repair his house, especially the electrical wiring and the paint

loans.name: Nelly Nohemi

texts.es: Nelly, tiene 30 años de edad, esta soltera y vive con su madre y con sus tres hermanos en el municipio de Puerto Cortes. Siempre se ha dedicado al comercio,  hace 9 años se dedica a la venta de comida como ser pollo con tajadas, chuletas, tacos, pastelitos, baleadas (tortilla de harina rellena de frijoles, huevo, queso y otros), etc. el negocio lo tiene en su casa donde ya es reconocida por sus clientes.  El préstamo que ha solicitado es el sexto ciclo con ODEF, con este actual que es por 10,000 lempiras, el cual lo invertirá en la compra de materia prima para el negocio como ser carnes, arroz, manteca, harina, condimentos etc. Para la elaboración de comidas. Ella considera que mejorara el negocio y su aportación para el crecimiento económico del nucleo familiar.
texts.en:
Nelly is 30 years old and single. She lives with her mother and three siblings in the town of Puerto Cortes.

Nelly has always been a merchant. For the past nine years, she has been selling food such as chicken with fried plantains, chops, tacos, pastries, “baleadas” (a flour tortilla stuffed with beans, eggs, cheese, and other items), and other dishes. Her business is located in her home and is already known among her customers.

The loan she is requesting is her sixth transaction with ODEF. Her current loan is for 10,000 HNL and will be invested in supplies for her business such as meats, rice, lard, flour, condiments, and other products used in preparing food. Nelly believes that improving her business with this assistance will contribute toward the financial growth of her immediate family.

loans.use: to buy meats, rice, lard, flour, condiments, and other products.

loans.name: Enerstina

texts.en:
Enerstina is 24 years old and single. She has two children. She owns and operates a small store, selling a variety of items. She has been doing this for five years.

Enerstina needs a loan, which she will use to buy goods to sell at the store, including ice cream, corned beef, biscuits, potatoes, onions, box chicken, mutton flaps, noodles, mosquito coils, cigarettes and toilet rolls. She hopes to use her profits to pay for her children's education. She joined SPBD in 2011, to gain access to capital for her business.

loans.use: to buy goods to sell at the store, including ice cream, corned beef, and potatoes

loans.name: Maureen

texts.en: Maureen is 36 years old, and with her partner, they now have two children. She runs a small business selling pancakes in her community and has been doing this for three years. Maureen has requested a loan to buy an oven, flour, sugar, a frying pan and baking soda. She joined SPBD in 2012 to gain access to capital. With her earnings, Maureen will help with her family's weekly expenses.

loans.use: to buy an oven, flour, sugar, a frying pan and baking soda.

loans.name: Puao

texts.en: Puao is a 36-year-old married woman with four children. She has a small plantation and grows taro and bananas to earn a living. She has been doing this for three years. Puao has requested a loan to buy a wheelbarrow, a rake, taro roots, barbed wire, chemicals, gloves, a digging stick, a file and backpack sprayer. She has been a member of SPBD since 2012. With her profits, Puao hopes to help with her family's weekly expenses.

loans.use: to buy a wheelbarrow, a rake, taro roots, barbed wire, chemicals, gloves, a digging stick, a file and backpack sprayer.

loans.name: Nebrath

texts.en:
Nebrath is a conservative person, who prefers not to have her photo published online. Her husband appears in the photo instead. The photo was taken at the furniture store.

Nebrath is a 26-year-old, married woman from Jablia. She lives with her husband and two young children, a boy and a girl. Nebrath's husband is an employee in the public sector. He gets a low income, which is not enough to cover all the family's needs. Nebrath and her husband would like to improve their home by buying the necessary home appliances.

Nebrath took a USD loan from FATEN. This loan will help her to buy living room seats.  This will improve the home and provide more comfortable living conditions.

loans.use: to buy living room seats for the family home

loans.name: Richar

texts.es:
Richar es un hombre de 31 años, vive en la ciudad de Nazca con su esposa y su pequeño hijo, el es una persona muy amable, trabajador y entusiasta, que junto con su esposa dedican todos sus esfuerzos por sacar adelante a su familia; lamentablemente por falta de recursos económicos y por la necesidad de trabajar, Richar no pudo estudiar la carrera profesional de Gastronomía que deseaba.
Por iniciativa propia, Richar se dedica a la agricultura, el tiene una pequeña parcela donde cultiva papa, el realiza sus labores de campo todos los días por un aproximado de 10 horas y cree que le va bien por su dedicación y esfuerzo.
Richar se encuentra muy agradecido con los prestamistas Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada cubrirá los gastos de riego, abono y cosecha de su cultivo, de esta manera Richar asegurara una buena cosecha, así pues el seguirá trabajando y esforzándose para lograr su gran sueño de ampliar sus cultivos.
texts.en:
Richar, 31, lives in the city of Nazca with his wife and small son.  He is a very kind, hard-working, enthusiastic person who, together with his wife, dedicates all his efforts to providing for his family.  Unfortunately, due to a lack of economic resources and the need to work, Richard was  unable to get a degree in gastronomy as he would have liked.

On his own initiative, Richar works in agriculture and owns a small patch of land where he grows potatoes.  He works every day in the field for about ten hours and believes things are going well for him because of his dedication and hard work.

Richar is very grateful to Kiva lenders because thanks to their help he is able to pay for irrigation, fertilizing and harvesting costs for his crop.  Richar is sure of having a good harvest, allowing him to continue working so he can reach his goal of expanding his cropland.

loans.use: To cover cost of irrigation, fertilizing and harvesting of his crop.

loans.name: Fofoga

texts.en: Fofoga is a 21-year-old woman who is single with no children. She has a small taxi service business. She has been in this business for two years. Fofoga needs a loan to buy new tires, a taxi sign and to renew the car license. She will use her profits to pay for her children's education. Fofoga joined SPBD in 2013 to gain access to financial services.

loans.use: to buy new tires, a taxi sign and to renew the car license.

loans.name: Puavai

texts.en: Puavai is a 22-year-old single woman with two children. She has a small plantation and grows taro to earn a living. She has been doing this for three years. Puavai has requested a loan to buy a backpack sprayer, fertilizer and chemicals. She has been a member of SPBD since 2012. With her profits, Puavai hopes to pay for her family's weekly expenses.

loans.use: to buy a backpack sprayer, fertilizer and chemicals.

loans.name: Gaibullo

texts.ru: Гайбулло 38 лет. У него высшее образование. Он по специальности физик и работал в этой сфере в течение 5 лет. Он женат и является отцом двоих детей. Гайбулло проживает со своей семьей в районе Дж.Руми. Чтобы улучшить финансовое состояние семьи он решил заняться животноводческим бизнесом. Гайбулло хочет выращивать крупнорогатый скот для продажи. Для реализации цели он обратился за кредитом. На сумму кредита и своего сбережения он планирует купить трех коров и телят, а также корм. Гайбулло будет содержать скот во дворе своего дома в коровнике. Он имеет все условия для содержания и выращивания скота.
texts.en:
Gaibullo is 38 years old and he has a higher education.  A physicist by training, he has worked in his field for five years.  He is also married and the father of two children.  He lives with his family in the J. Rumy district of Tajikistan.

In order to improve his family's financial situation, he has decided to get involved in animal husbandry.  He wants to raise cattle for resale and he has requested a loan to achieve his goal.  He plans to use his loan and his savings to buy three cows and some calves, as well as some cattle feed.  He will keep his livestock at home in a barn.  He has all the necessary conditions to keep and raise cattle.

loans.use: to buy three cows and some calves, as well as animal feed, in order to start his livestock trading business.

loans.name: Verónica Lisette

texts.es:
La Señorita Verónica forma parte del grupo de crédito Pauteñitas, vive en el cantón de Paute lugar que tiene un clima privilegiado, sus tierras son fértiles en donde se cosechan las más hermosas flores y una gran variedad de frutos, existen varios comercios sobre todo para disfrutar de la gastronomía, su gente aun mantienen la cultura y tradiciones de sus pueblo.

La Señorita Verónica tiene 18 años, es soltera y vive con sus padres, su padre se dedica a la construcción y presta sus servicios como guardia de seguridad, su madre tiene un restaurante, no tienen casa propia y viven en una finca que cuidan.

Doña Verónica se dedica a la venta ambulante de de chuzos (carne en palito), actividad que le está desempeñando hace menos de un año, ha escogido este trabajo porque le da tiempo para realizar sus tareas personales, al mismo tiempo que ayuda a mejorar la estabilidad económica de su casa. 

El dinero de su crédito anterior lo va a invirtió en el restaurante de su mamá y en sus estudios. Ella está repitiendo el crédito y lo va ha  invertir en la compra una carreta que le hace falta para su negocio. El grupo de crédito le gusta porque al ser muy joven no tienen muchas oportunidades para realizar un crédito pero aquí todas las socias le apoyan y le motivan para que se supere.
texts.en:
Verónica is a member of the communal bank "Pauteñitas".  She lives in the Paute Canton which has a privileged climate and fertile soil where beautiful flowers and a wide variety of fruit grow.  There are numerous businesses allowing one to enjoy local gastronomy.  The people here maintain the culture and tradition of village life.

Verónica is 18 years old, single and lives with her parents.  Her father works in construction and also as a security guard.  Her mother has a restaurant.  They do not own their own home but live on the farm they take care of.

Verónica has a skewered meat business and has been working as a street vendor for less than a year.  She decided on this line of work because it allows her time to take care of personal issues and also help improve the household economy.

The money from the previous loan was used to invest in her mother's restaurant and to pay for her studies.  She is requesting a new loan to buy a cart for her food business.  She likes the communal bank because, as a young person, she does not have many opportunities to take out a loan.  All the young members of the group support and encourage one another in order to improve their situations.

loans.use: To buy a cart.

loans.name: Leata

texts.en: Leata is a 31-year-old married woman with 1 child. She makes and sells pancakes, scones, muffins, etc. in her community to earn a living. She has 3 years of experience with this business. Leata needs a loan to buy flour, sugar, eggs, yeast, butter, cooking oil and an oven. She plans to use her profits to support her family financially. Leata has been a member of SPBD since 2010.

loans.use: to buy flour, sugar, eggs, yeast, butter, cooking oil and an oven.

loans.name: Tepatasi

texts.en: Tepatasi is a 25-year-old single woman with one child. She has a small plantation and grows taro to earn a living. She has been doing this for three years. Tepatasi has requested a loan to buy a backpack sprayer, chemicals, taro roots and fertilizer. She has been a member of SPBD since 2010. With her profits, Tepatasi hopes to pay for her child's education.

loans.use: to buy a backpack sprayer, chemicals, taro roots and fertilizer.

loans.name: María Elena

texts.es:
La Señora María vive en  el cantón de Paute lugar que tiene un clima privilegiado, sus tierras son fértiles en donde se cosechan las más hermosas flores y una gran variedad de frutos, existen varios comercios sobre todo para disfrutar de la gastronomía, su gente aun mantienen la cultura y tradiciones de sus pueblos.

Doña María tiene 47 años, es casada y fruto de su unión conyugal ha concebido 5 hijos de 23, 22, 20, 19 y 4 años, 4 de sus hijos son mayores de edad, trabajan y le ayudan economícamente, a mas de trabajar tres de ellos cursan los estudios universitario. Su esposo labora de albañil, la casa en la que viven es propia.

La Señora. María se dedica a la agricultura y cría de pollos y ganado, se encuentra trabajando desde muy joven ya que sus padres le enseñaron esta actividad. 

 Su crédito anterior lo invirtió en la compra de pollos de los cuales obtuvo buenas ganancias. Esta repitiendo el crédito para comprar pollos y alimento para un chanchos. Su grupo de crédito le gusta por la solidaridad que existe entre todas las socias.
texts.en:
María lives in the canton of Paute which has a warm climate and fertile soil where beautiful flowers and a wide variety of fruit are grown.  There are several businesses here where one can enjoy the local cuisine.  Its people are friendly, kind and still maintain their culture and traditions.

María, 47, is married and has five children, ages 23, 22, 20, 19 and 4.  The oldest ones work and help out financially.  Three of them attend the university.  Her husband works as a bricklayer and they live in their own home.

María works in agriculture and raises chickens and pigs.  Her parents taught her the trade when she was very young and she has been working ever since.

She used her previous loan to buy chickens and was able to make a considerable profit.  She is requesting a new loan to buy chickens and pig feed.  She likes her communal bank because of the solidarity among all of its members.

loans.use: To buy chickens and pig feed.

loans.name: Agostinha

texts.en: Agostinha is applying for a loan of 1,000 USD from TRM (Tuba Rai Metin). She is married, and she has one child. She is 29 years old. She is running a kiosk in front of her house, and she will use the loan to buy stocks to keep in her store such as bags for kids, school bags for kids, kids' shoes, shoes for women as well as men, hats and so on. She is making good money from selling, and she wants to apply for a bigger loan in the future. Agostinha is living in a town nearby the school; her kiosk is located in a strategic place where many people come to buy including students. Her husband is a driver.

loans.use: to buy bags for kids, school bags for kids, kids' shoes, shoes for women as well as men, hats and so on.

loans.name: Angelica

texts.en:
Angelica is applying for a loan of $600 to improve her business. She is married and she has one child. She is a woman living in a house with her ​​family and lived with her ​​women to own animals like horses, buffaloes, cows, and goats. 

She is running a business in front of her house by selling hard drinks (beer), soft drinks (fanta, coca-cola, sprite, sagiko), body lotion, cigarettes, eggs, books, pencils, salt, coffee, sugar, milk and water. She is making a good income from selling palm wine and she wants to buy more stock with the loan. She is living in a town near the main road, so many people come to buy and she is selling every day. She started her business a year ago with her own working capital.

loans.use: To buy beer, soft drinks, body lotion, cigarettes, eggs, books, pencils, salt, etc. to resell.

loans.name: Maria

texts.en: Maria is a 22-year-old single woman with two children. She has a small plantation and grows taro to earn a living. She has been doing this for three years. Maria has requested a loan to buy a backpack sprayer, fertilizer, bush knives, barbed wire and a wheelbarrow. She has been a member of SPBD since 2010. With her profits, Maria hopes to pay for her children's education.

loans.use: to buy a backpack sprayer, fertilizer, bush knives, barbed wire and a wheelbarrow.
